item.title: Aufiblue
item.description: How did I discover Pen and Paper? About nine months ago, I listened to a podcast called “Zeitsprung” which recorded a podcast episode together with someone else called “3W6”. I was interested in it and this is how I came across this podcast. It deals with the topic of Pen and Paper and I listened to some episodes. What happened afterwards? So I quickly came across other Pen and Paper podcasts like “Rookie’s Die”, “Dungeon Starter” or “Pen and Paper” from the Rocketbeans.
